Subject.DN: CN:rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK
Subject.CN: rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK

Issuer.DN: CN:rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK
Issuer.CN: rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows the app to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.full_description:
Allows the app to disable the
      keylock and any associated password security.  For example, the phone
      disables the keylock when receiving an incoming phone call, then
      re-enables the keylock when the call is finished.

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.short_description: edit your text messages (SMS or MMS)
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.full_description:
Allows the app to write
      to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious apps
      may delete your messages.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.full_description: Allows the app to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.short_description: use any media decoder for playback
android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.full_description:
Allows the app to use any installed
        media decoder to decode for playback.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.full_description:
Allows the app to see the
        number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect
        the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.full_description:
Allows the app to add messages
      to your voicemail inbox.

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.full_description:
Allows the app to call
        any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention.
        Malicious apps may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency
        services.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.full_description:
Allows the app to view the
      configuration of the Bluetooth on the phone, and to make and accept
      connections with paired devices.

android.permission.CAMERA.full_description: This app can take pictures and record videos using the camera at any time.

android.permission.INTERNET.full_description:
Allows the app to create
     network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other
     applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this
     permission is not required to send data to the internet.

android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.short_description: bind to a notification listener service
android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.full_description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a notification listener service. Should never be needed for normal apps.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description:
Allows the app to
      read data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the
      frequency with which you've called, emailed, or communicated in other ways
      with specific individuals. This permission allows apps to save your
      contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your
      knowledge.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.full_description:
Allows the app to
    modify the data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the
    frequency with which you've called, emailed, or communicated in other ways
    with specific contacts. This permission allows apps to delete contact
    data.

android.permission.SEND_SMS.full_description:
Allows the app to send SMS messages.
     This may result in unexpected charges. Malicious apps may cost you money by
     sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description:
Allows the app to get
      the list of accounts known by the phone.  This may include any accounts
      created by applications you have installed.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.full_description:
Allows an application to add
        Homescreen shortcuts without user intervention.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.full_description:
Allows the app to
        have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting.
        This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the
        app to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to view
      information about network connections such as which networks exist and are
      connected.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.full_description:
Allows the app to modify your phone's call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls.
        Malicious apps may use this to erase or modify your call log.

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.full_description: This app can read your call history.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.short_description: modify or delete the contents of your SD card
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.full_description: Allows the app to write to the SD card.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.full_description:
Allows the app to receive and process SMS
      messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your
      device without showing them to you.

android.permission.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTER.full_description: Allows an app to ask for permission to ignore battery optimizations for that app.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.full_description:
Allows the app to
    perform operations like adding and removing accounts, and deleting
    their password.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.short_description: read the contents of your SD card
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.full_description: Allows the app to read the contents of your SD card.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.full_description: This app can get your location based on GPS or network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi networks. These location services must be turned on and available on your phone for the app to be able to use them. This may increase battery consumption.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.full_description:
Allows the app
    to use the account authenticator capabilities of the
    AccountManager, including creating accounts and getting and
    setting their passwords.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.full_description:
Allows the app to call phone numbers
      without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls.
      Note that this doesn't allow the app to call emergency numbers.
      Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your
      confirmation.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.full_description:
Allows the app to modify the
        system's settings data. Malicious apps may corrupt your system's
        configuration.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to access the phone
      features of the device.  This permission allows the app to determine the
      phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number
      connected by a call.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.full_description: Allows the app to make use of foreground services.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.full_description: This app can get your location based on network sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi networks. These location services must be turned on and available on your phone for the app to be able to use them.

android.permission.READ_SMS.short_description: read your text messages (SMS or MMS)
android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: This app can read all SMS (text) messages stored on your phone.

android.permission.VIBRATE.full_description: Allows the app to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_P.full_description: Allows the app to read and write Do Not Disturb configuration.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.short_description: This app can appear on top of other apps
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.full_description: This app can appear on top of other apps or other parts of the screen. This may interfere with normal app usage and change the way that other apps appear.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to view information
      about Wi-Fi networking, such as whether Wi-Fi is enabled and name of
      connected Wi-Fi devices.

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.full_description:
Allows the app to receive and process MMS
      messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your
      device without showing them to you.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.full_description: This app can record audio using the microphone at any time.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to control the
        phone features of the device. An app with this permission can switch
        networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like without ever notifying
        you.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows the app to modify global audio settings such as volume and which speaker is used for output.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.full_description:
Allows the app to read
     personal profile information stored on your device, such as your name and
     contact information. This means the app can identify you and may send your
     profile information to others.

android.permission.ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS.full_description: Allows the app to answer an incoming phone call.

attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v2.0 to extract

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.full_description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.short_description: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.full_description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.full_description: Allows an application to use any media decoder when decoding for playback.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.full_description: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.full_description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.full_description: Allows the application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention. Malicious applications may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency services.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.full_description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.CAMERA.full_description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.INTERNET.full_description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

android.permission.SEND_SMS.full_description: Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.short_description: write (but not read) the user's contacts data.
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.full_description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.full_description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.full_description: Allows an application to read from external storage

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.full_description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.full_description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.full_description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.

android.permission.VIBRATE.full_description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.full_description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.full_description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc. Does not include placing calls.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.short_description: read the user's personal profile data
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.full_description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.

android.permission.VIBRATE.full_description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.full_description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.full_description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc. Does not include placing calls.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.short_description: read the user's personal profile data
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v2.0 to extract

http_headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; Pixel 3a Build/QP1A.190711.020.C3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/77.0.3865.92 Mobile Safari/537.36

Issuer.DN: CN:rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK
Issuer.CN: rockz5555 OU=Droid Freedom Unit O=Droid Freedom Inc L=Unknown S=Unknown C=LK

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.full_description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.short_description: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.full_description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.full_description: Allows an application to use any media decoder when decoding for playback.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.full_description: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.full_description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.full_description: Allows the application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention. Malicious applications may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency services.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.full_description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.INTERNET.full_description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

android.permission.SEND_SMS.full_description: Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.full_description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.short_description: write (but not read) the user's contacts data.
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.full_description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.full_description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.full_description: Allows an application to read from external storage

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.full_description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.full_description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.full_description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.VIBRATE.full_description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.short_description: read the user's personal profile data
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.full_description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.CAMERA.full_description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc. Does not include placing calls.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.full_description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.short_description: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.full_description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.full_description: Allows an application to use any media decoder when decoding for playback.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.full_description: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.full_description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.full_description: Allows the application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention. Malicious applications may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency services.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.full_description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.INTERNET.full_description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

android.permission.SEND_SMS.full_description: Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc. Does not include placing calls.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.full_description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.short_description: write (but not read) the user's contacts data.
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.full_description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.full_description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.full_description: Allows an application to read from external storage

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.full_description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.full_description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.full_description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.full_description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.full_description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.full_description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.

android.permission.VIBRATE.full_description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.short_description: read the user's personal profile data
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.full_description: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.full_description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.CAMERA.full_description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.full_description: Allows application to receive and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.full_description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.full_description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v2.0 to extract
